name: Chicago Hard House
description: Originated from Chicago around the mid-1990s as a development of Ghetto House, emphasizing hard-hitting, off-beat drum patterns, fast tempos, and lack of melodies.

children.name: LA Hard House
children.description: Distorted, minimalistic TR-909 derived rhythms, basic climaxing structures and heavy reliance on high-pitched synthesizer / hoover sounds.
